name: ChatGPT
description: Advanced conversational AI by OpenAI. Great for general chat, coding help, writing, and analysis.
pricingNote: Free tier is quite generous for most users

name: Claude
description: Anthropic's AI assistant. Excellent for detailed analysis, coding, and long-form content.
pricingNote: Free tier available with message limits

name: Midjourney
description: Leading AI image generation tool. Creates stunning artistic images from text prompts.

name: DALL-E 3
description: OpenAI's image generation model. Integrated with ChatGPT for seamless creation.

name: Stable Diffusion
description: Open-source image generation model. Can run locally or via various web UIs.

name: RunwayML
description: AI-powered video generation and editing. Great for content creators.

name: Pika Labs
description: Text-to-video generation platform. Create short videos from prompts.

name: ElevenLabs
description: Advanced AI voice synthesis and cloning. Natural-sounding text-to-speech.

name: Suno AI
description: AI music generation. Create full songs with vocals from text prompts.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: AI pair programmer. Suggests code and entire functions in your IDE.

name: Cursor
description: AI-first code editor. Built from ground up for AI pair programming.

name: Perplexity AI
description: AI-powered search engine. Provides sourced answers to questions.

name: Notion AI
description: AI writing assistant integrated into Notion. Great for docs and notes.

name: Jasper
description: AI content creation platform for marketing copy and blog posts.

name: Synthesia
description: AI video generation with avatars. Create professional videos without filming.

name: Gemini
description: Google's multimodal AI. Integrated with Google Workspace.

name: Otter.ai
description: AI meeting transcription and summarization. Great for note-taking.

name: Hugging Face
description: Open-source AI model hub. Access thousands of models for free.
pricingNote: Most models free, some compute costs

name: Replicate
description: Run open-source AI models in the cloud via API.

name: Leonardo.ai
description: AI image generation with fine control. Great for game assets and art.
